newsitem.title: THAILAND: Burma 1996 rice exports seen at 300,000 tonnes.
newsitem.headline: Burma 1996 rice exports seen at 300,000 tonnes.

text.p: Burma's rice exports this year are expected to plunge to 300,000 tonnes or less from an estimated 645,000 tonnes in 1995, the U.S. Embassy's agricultural attache said on Thursday.
But the trend is likely to improve in 1997 when exports are expected to rise to around 500,000 tonnes, he said.

The United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) projected the 1996/97 (April-March) rice output at 18 million tonnes, compared with 17.24 million tonnes in the previous crop year, the official said.
